question: Name one of the major neighborhoods in Keratsini, Greece.
asked_question_translated: Vymenujte jednu z hlavných štvrtí v Keratsini v Grécku.
answer: Jedna z hlavných štvrtí v Keratsini v Grécku je Amfiali.
answer_translated_eng: One of the main neighborhoods in Keratsini, Greece is Amfiali.
